website_summaries.verdict: A combination daily exfoliating scrub and detoxifying mask.
pros: Crushed Brazilian quartz to scrubs away dead skin while traces of Amazon river clay and tropical volcanic pumice help to smooth and purify
cons: Has a bright yellow color that some users were not a fan of

customer_reviews.title: Stains your bathtub and towels
customer_reviews.text: Will give 3 stars because the smell is deliciously good but this stuff is awful to get out of my white bathtub and to get out of towels. It’s like it stains whatever it touches. I do love the shower gel, bum bum cream and the glow oil but I will not be purchasing this scrub again.
customer_reviews.author: HeatherFelts5

customer_reviews.title: Smells great.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to try this after watching a YouTuber that I watch all the time recommended this. It smells amazing I have the lotion and the Chapstick so I just figured that this will be a good product to for me. I like the body scrub idea but it completely dries out my skin so bad to the point that I'm ashy all over. So I will use this product but probably just once a week.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Just okay
customer_reviews.text: It’s just okay. I love this company and so many of their products but this was a miss for me. Does not smell like the signature Brazilian bum bum cream or mist. It isn’t all that exfoliating and I couldn’t notice a difference in my skin after using it as a mask. It is a bright concentrated yellow color that will stain your white shower floor so make sure to wash it down the drain immediately.
customer_reviews.author: gracyn

customer_reviews.title: IT WORKS!
customer_reviews.text: This product leaves my skin so clean and is non-drying. My skin feels so smooth afterward. Also, I think the turmeric makes your skin glow.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Gonzales

customer_reviews.title: Check everything
customer_reviews.text: I got this some time ago and finally decided to try because I’m taking some family photos next week. Don’t know how I didn’t notice I was scammed into paying for a not for sale demo sampler. They didn’t even bother to take tag off the top
customer_reviews.author: Miss C!

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product!
customer_reviews.text: I'm in love with this product. My face is super sensitive but so far so good and it smells amazing. I used it all over as a scrub and as a mask for my face. My body feels soft and smooth. Satisfied customer!!!
customer_reviews.author: Reet

customer_reviews.title: Smells great but...
customer_reviews.text: Smells great but not that scrubby. Definitely not worth twenty something dollars. Will not repurchase.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah D.

customer_reviews.title: The smell you want when you desire to be eaten all up!
customer_reviews.text: This is my new favorite product! I have already informed my husband that I will be needing the entire line! Everything!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Works well - could be thicker.
customer_reviews.text: Love this line’s lotion and gave this a try. Product is a bit thin so I went through pretty quickly but when I did use it it worked well.
customer_reviews.author: Fiddle-dee-dee

customer_reviews.title: Smells great
customer_reviews.text: Smells great can’t say I see a big difference with using it however.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Body scrub
customer_reviews.text: Love the scrub and the scent but came open on the top.
customer_reviews.author: danica

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: Your skin will be as soft as a baby after just one use. And it smells so amazing. I will buy this over and over again
customer_reviews.author: kayla l flanagan

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product!!
customer_reviews.text: Omg!!! Y’all need this in your life. I’ve used it twice and i have seen a huge difference in the texture of my skin. Smells great.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Everything STOPS when I walk in wearing this!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely in love!!! Smells sinfully good and makes your skin incredibly soft! I get so many compliments when I wear the bum bum cream and fragrance after using this. You can do all three or just wearing the bum bum cream and fragrance gives the same results.
customer_reviews.author: Marche Murray

customer_reviews.title: Made skin look yellow
customer_reviews.text: Made my skin look like a yellow tint and is a bit difficult to use. Once I rinsed it off my skin was back to normal color but the texture is strange. I was excited about it because I love the Bum Bum Cream but really don’t like this and only used a few times. The smell is awesome, just like the cream but I won’t purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Truly works ! Firstly the scent .... to die for . The yellow tint in the scrub does give your skin a glow after serval uses . The texture of the scrub is the good , not too abrasive . Very moisturizing as well. Overall the product does deliver ! My skin is smooth and supple !!!
customer_reviews.author: Joanna J

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product it works great! Just make sure you rinse the shower walls if you get it on them or the curtain it will leave a stain. If left it will come off when shower is cleaned. Other than that I love this scrub!!!
customer_reviews.author: AK

customer_reviews.title: Odd color residue
customer_reviews.text: Not crazy about this scrub. It smells nice but turns skin a turmeric color. Would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Belle

customer_reviews.title: Smells amazing, but chunky and orange
customer_reviews.text: I live in Brazilian bum bum cream in the summer (and winter really), so my recent facination with body scrubs led me to this product! I expected a more sugar-type scrub, but this is more like a natural scrub with rounded chunks that didn’t feel as scrubby as other products. It also left a lot of brown grains and bright orange splotches in the shower if I didn’t rinse them. I was also still orange when I got out of the shower in some places. I wouldn’t buy again, but will try to use this since it wasn’t cheap!
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Works wet or dry
customer_reviews.text: Product can be removed using a wet or dry brush, followed by a wet washcloth. Takes off layers of dead skin easily and leaves a pleasant fragrance. It is worth the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Black Ac.

customer_reviews.title: Best Scrub
customer_reviews.text: I fell I love the scrub all over my body. Smells amazing 😉
customer_reviews.author: Joanne I Terrell

product_meta.title: SOL DE JANEIRO Brazilian Bod Buff Smoothing Scrub 'N' Mask
product_meta.description: This unique, first-of-its-kind formula for the body that works double duty as a daily exfoliating scrub and a detoxifying treatment mask. Crushed Brazilian quartz crystal help polish and smooth, while soothing Amazon river clay helps purify. Get ready for super soft, irresistible, touch-me-now Brazilian babe skin.

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
